text: Mencoba staycation pertama kali di hotel ini melalui aplikasi OTA, Dan ternyata, Wow... jauh dari harapan. Booking kamar non smoking, ranjang besar ternyata diberi kamar dilantai khusus smoking room. Katanya sudah full yg non smoking ranjang besar padahal sudah booked pukul 10 pagi. Sempat masuk dikamar tersebut, enaklah untuk perokok tapi yang tidak merokok kasihan. Walaupun sudah ditawarkan untuk cleaning air tapi saya menolak (masih bau asap rokok). Karena istri saya gak tahan bau asap rokok. Akhirnya menghubungi front desk dan diberi kamar non smoking room twin (bukan ranjang besar karena full booked).  Untuk kebersihan kamar, toilet, dan lain2, overall is good. Showernya okelah. Hanya khusus hotel ini untuk dental kit wajib request dlu. Untuk breakfast gak banget, lauknya habis, makan bubur ayam tanpa ayam (makan pagi pkl 7.30), hanya roti tawar yg tersedia. Hampir makan tanpa minum jika saya tidak request ke fb desk. Karena untuk minum hanya staff fb yg serve ke guest. FB service wasn't good. Thanks.
title: Bad Services

Well............. I used to lived in Pangkalpinang for awhile few years ago. and at that time. this hotel has  not established yet.
All of sudden I  missed Bangka island so much and I decide to unwind myself in this silent island.
I've been tried to stayed in some hotels existed, so the last day I stayed in Bangka I choose SwissBelhotel Pangkalpinang.
Check in process was so fast and a girl was help me in sincere  service ( sorry I've forgot her name ) my bad.
Got the room and it was met my expectation. The room was very clean, spacious with a GOOD PRICE hehehe

Thank to your staffs that very helpful during my short stay.

text: This is my first time staying at Swiss-BelHotel Pangkalpinang for a business trip. I've enjoyed stay in room 833 because the view of the pool is clearly visible from the window. The room is comfortable. Beside that, the hospitality of the hotel staff who consider their guests like friends, is one of the reasons I stay here. I thank Dita & Najwa as Sales & Marketing team for accommodating my room according to my criteria and needs. And also the reataurant staff who served me when I had breakfast at the restaurant. Hey, there is a 'legendary' place called La Terrase in front of the hotel that can be used as a brunch, lunch, or dinner place with decorations that are indulgent to the eyes. Again, I really recommend you to stay here if you have a plan to visit Pangkalpinang, Bangka Island. Thank you Swiss-BelHotel Pangkalpinang! See you on my next trip ;)
title: Find Your "Good Time" in Swiss-BelHotel Pangkalpinang

text: This is my come back time to Pangkal Pinang after my last visit 7 years ago. I thought Swiss-Belhotel has the same standard, same appearance, same procedure eveywhere, but the Swiss-Belhotel in Pangkalpinang gave me better feeling by local greeting gesture which managed to bring me into the new atmosphere.  It works!! I liked their quick response for handling my luggage, passing a room sandal I wanted and giving information about nice spots where I should go. During stay at this hotel, I felt comfortable with the bed room, shower room due to all very clean, managed very well. Breakfast menu was very good, combination between western and local taste! Ballroom was big and good, but sound system which is a focal item in the meeting should be taken care.
title: The right choice for staying
